en.title: Facebook/Meta Business Verification Guide
en.description: This guide helps businesses get their Facebook/Meta Business verification to get started with the Facebook business services
en.body:
1. Why is business verification required

Meta uses Business Verification to confirm that your company is a real, legally registered business.
A verified business can unlock higher WhatsApp messaging limits, add more phone numbers, and is required by many WhatsApp Business Solution Providers (BSPs) to enable large-scale broadcasting.

2. Prerequisites checklist

Before you start, make sure you have the following:

  • Admin access to your Meta Business (Business Manager) account in Meta Business Suite.

  • A legal, registered business (company, LLP, sole proprietorship, etc.).

  • A website that shows your legal business name in the footer, About, or Contact section.

  • Access to a business email or phone number that matches your business information.

You will also need clear scans or PDFs of at least 2–3 official documents:

  • Business registration certificate/incorporation certificate / GST or tax certificate.

  • Utility bill, bank statement, or phone bill showing your business address or phone.

  • Screenshot to include in your document: “Sample acceptable business documents list” (e.g., certificate + utility bill).

3. Accessing Meta Business Suite & Security Centre

  1. Open a browser and go to business.facebook.com, then log in with your Facebook account.

  2. Select the correct Business from the dropdown in the top-left (the same one connected to your WhatsApp setup / BSP).

  3. In the left sidebar, click Settings → Business settings (or “More Business settings”, depending on your layout).

  4. In Business settings, go to Security Centre in the left or top navigation.

In Security Centre, you will either see Start verification or a note saying you are ineligible for verification at this time.

Screenshot to include: “Meta Business Suite → Business Settings → Security Centre with the ‘Start verification’ button highlighted.”

4. Starting the verification process

  1. In Security Centre, click Start verification.

  2. A wizard will open, asking for your business details such as:

  • Legal business name (must match your official documents).

  • Business address (city, state, postal code exactly as on documents).

  • Business phone number (can be any business number where Meta can reach you, not necessarily the WhatsApp number).

  • Website URL where your legal name is clearly visible.

3. Carefully review the information and click Next / Continue.

Screenshot to include: “Business details form showing legal name, address, phone, website fields filled correctly.”

5. Uploading your business documents

On the documents step, Meta will ask you to upload files that prove:

  • Your legal business name (registration certificate, GST/tax cert, incorporation document).

  • Your business address (same or another document showing address).

  • Optionally, your business phone number (phone/utility bill, bank statement, etc.).

Guidelines to follow:

  • Upload clear, readable scans or PDFs; avoid cropped or blurred images.

  • Ensure the name and address exactly match what you typed in the form.

  • Use official government or tax-related documents wherever possible.

Screenshot to include: “Upload documents screen with example files attached and document types visible (e.g., Certificate of Incorporation + Utility Bill).”

Click Submit / Next once all required files are uploaded.

6. Confirming your business via email, phone, or domain

After submitting documents, Meta asks you to confirm your connection to the business using one of these methods (options depend on your setup and region):

Email verification

  • Meta sends a code to a work email (for example, name@yourcompany.com).

  • The email domain must match your website domain.

Phone/text verification

  • Meta calls or sends an SMS with a code to your business phone number.

  • You may be asked to upload a document (e.g., utility bill) that shows this phone number.

Domain verification

  • You add a DNS TXT record or upload a special HTML file to your website domain following Meta’s instructions.

  • Once Meta detects it, your domain is verified and linked to your business.

Enter the code you receive or complete domain setup, then click Verify / Continue in Meta.

Screenshot to include: “Screen showing the choice of Email / Phone / Domain as verification methods and an example code entry field.”

7. Checking status and typical review time

After completion, your request goes into review with Meta.

  • For many accounts, decisions may arrive within a few minutes to 1–2 business days, but it can also take up to 10–14 business days in some cases.

  • You can check progress in Business settings → Security Center, where the status will show as In review, Business verified, or Verification failed.

When verification is approved, you will see a green shield and the label Business verified next to your business name.

Screenshot to include: “Security Centre with green shield and ‘Business Verified’ status visible.”

8. Common rejection reasons (and how to avoid them)

If Meta rejects your verification, it is usually due to one of the following:

  • The business name or address in the form does not exactly match your documents.

  • Uploaded files are unclear, cropped, or missing pages.

  • The business website does not show the legal business name clearly.

  • An unsupported or incorrect document type (e.g., personal ID instead of business registration).

Meta typically allows multiple attempts; if verification fails several times, you may need to appeal or contact Meta support via their help channels.

Screenshot to include: “Example of a rejection message in Security Centre with guidance to ‘Re-verify’ or appeal.”

9. After verification: enabling WhatsApp broadcasting

Once your Meta Business shows as Business verified, your WhatsApp BSP / platform (e.g., your broadcasting tool) can:

  • Unlock higher messaging limits so you can send campaigns to more contacts.

  • Add more WhatsApp numbers under the same Business Manager if needed.

  • Proceed with any remaining setup for WhatsApp Business API/Cloud API and broadcasting templates.

Recommendation for your documentation: add a final step like “Once you see ‘Business verified’, please share a screenshot with our support team so we can complete your WhatsApp broadcasting setup.”

10. Quick reference block

  • Where to go: business.facebook.com → Business settings → Security Centre → Start verification.

  • What you need: Admin access, correct business details, website, and 2–3 official documents.

  • Typical review time: From a few minutes up to 10–14 business days.

  • Success indicator: Green shield + Business verified status in Security Centre.


​
​

es.title: Facebook/Meta Business Verification Guide
es.description: Esta guía ayuda a las empresas a obtener la verificación de Facebook/Meta Business para comenzar con los servicios empresariales de Facebook.
es.body:
1. ¿Por qué se requiere la verificación empresarial?

Meta utiliza la Verificación Empresarial para confirmar que su empresa es real y está legalmente registrada.
Una empresa verificada puede desbloquear límites de mensajería más altos en WhatsApp, agregar más números y es obligatoria para muchos Proveedores de Soluciones de WhatsApp Business (BSPs) para transmisiones a gran escala.

2. Lista de verificación de requisitos previos

Antes de comenzar, asegúrese de tener:

  • Acceso de administrador a su cuenta Meta Business (Business Manager).

  • Un negocio legal y registrado (empresa, LLP, autónomo, etc.).

  • Un sitio web que muestre el nombre legal de la empresa en el pie de página, sección Sobre o Contacto.

  • Acceso a un correo electrónico o teléfono empresarial que coincida con los datos de la empresa.

También necesitará escaneos claros o PDFs de mínimo 2–3 documentos oficiales:

  • Certificado de registro empresarial / certificado de incorporación / certificado fiscal o GST.

  • Factura de servicios, extracto bancario o factura telefónica con el domicilio de la empresa.

Screenshot a incluir: “Lista de documentos aceptables (ejemplo: certificado + factura de servicios).”

3. Accediendo a Meta Business Suite y Centro de Seguridad

  1. Abra un navegador y vaya a business.facebook.com, luego inicie sesión.

  2. Seleccione la empresa correcta en el menú superior izquierdo.

  3. En la barra lateral izquierda, haga clic en Configuración → Configuración del negocio.

  4. En Configuración del negocio, vaya al Centro de Seguridad.

Verá el botón Iniciar verificación o un aviso indicando que no es elegible aún.

Screenshot a incluir: “Meta Business Suite → Configuración del negocio → Centro de Seguridad con ‘Iniciar verificación’ destacado.”

4. Iniciando el proceso de verificación

  1. En el Centro de Seguridad, haga clic en Iniciar verificación.

  2. Aparecerá un formulario solicitando los datos:

  • Nombre legal de la empresa.

  • Dirección comercial (exacta como en los documentos).

  • Teléfono empresarial (no tiene que ser el número WhatsApp).

  • URL del sitio web con el nombre legal visible.

3. Revise todo y haga clic en Siguiente / Continuar.

Screenshot a incluir: “Formulario de datos empresariales completado correctamente.”

5. Subiendo sus documentos empresariales

Meta solicitará documentos que prueben:

  • El nombre legal (registro, certificado fiscal, incorporación).

  • La dirección comercial.

  • Opcionalmente, el número de teléfono comercial.

Directrices:

  • Envíe PDFs o escaneos legibles.

  • Nombre y dirección deben coincidir exactamente.

  • Use documentos oficiales siempre que sea posible.

Screenshot a incluir: “Pantalla de subida con documentos adjuntos.”

Haga clic en Enviar / Siguiente.

6. Confirmación vía correo, teléfono o dominio

Después de enviar los documentos, Meta pedirá verificación mediante:

Correo electrónico
Un código enviado a un email empresarial (ej.: nombre@suempresa.com).

Teléfono/SMS
Una llamada o SMS con un código.

Verificación de dominio
Añadir un registro DNS TXT o subir un archivo HTML al dominio del sitio.

Ingrese el código o complete el proceso del dominio y haga clic en Verificar.

Screenshot a incluir: “Pantalla con opciones de correo/teléfono/dominio y campo de código.”

7. Verificando el estado y tiempo de revisión

Una vez enviado, la revisión puede tomar:

  • Minutos a 1–2 días hábiles

  • En algunos casos hasta 10–14 días hábiles

El estado aparecerá como En revisión, Empresa verificada o Verificación fallida.

Screenshot a incluir: “Centro de Seguridad con escudo verde y Empresa verificada.”

8. Razones comunes de rechazo (y cómo evitarlas)

Meta suele rechazar por:

  • Nombre o dirección no coinciden exactamente.

  • Documentos borrosos o incompletos.

  • El sitio web no muestra claramente el nombre legal.

  • Documentos incorrectos (por ejemplo, documentos personales).

Meta permite varios intentos. Tras fallas repetidas, puede requerir apelación.

Screenshot a incluir: “Ejemplo de rechazo con opción Re-verificar.”

9. Después de la verificación: habilitando transmisiones en WhatsApp

Una vez verificada la empresa, su plataforma/BSP podrá:

  • Desbloquear límites más altos de mensajería.

  • Agregar más números de WhatsApp.

  • Completar configuraciones de WhatsApp API/Cloud API.

Recomendación: pida al cliente un screenshot que muestre “Empresa verificada”.

10. Bloque de referencia rápida

  • Dónde ir: business.facebook.com → Configuración del negocio → Centro de Seguridad → Iniciar verificación.

  • Qué necesita: Acceso admin, sitio web y documentos oficiales.

  • Tiempo de revisión: minutos a 10–14 días hábiles.

  • Indicador de éxito: Escudo verde + Empresa verificada.

pt.title: Facebook/Meta Business Verification Guide
pt.description: Este guia ajuda empresas a obter a verificação do Facebook/Meta Business para começar a utilizar os serviços empresariais do Facebook.
pt.body:
1. Por que a verificação comercial é necessária

A Meta usa a Verificação Comercial para confirmar que sua empresa é real e legalmente registrada.
Uma empresa verificada pode desbloquear limites mais altos de mensagens no WhatsApp, adicionar mais números de telefone e é obrigatória por muitos Provedores de Soluções WhatsApp Business (BSPs) para habilitar transmissões em larga escala.

2. Lista de verificação de pré-requisitos

Antes de começar, certifique-se de ter o seguinte:

  • Acesso de administrador à sua conta Meta Business (Business Manager) no Meta Business Suite.

  • Uma empresa legal e registrada (empresa, LLP, proprietário individual etc.).

  • Um site que exiba o nome legal da sua empresa no rodapé, na seção Sobre ou Contato.

  • Acesso a um e-mail comercial ou número de telefone que corresponda às informações da empresa.

Você também precisará de scans claros ou PDFs de pelo menos 2–3 documentos oficiais:

  • Certificado de registro comercial / certificado de incorporação / certidão GST ou fiscal.

  • Conta de serviços públicos, extrato bancário ou fatura telefônica mostrando o endereço ou telefone comercial.

Screenshot a incluir no seu documento: “Lista de documentos comerciais aceitáveis (exemplo: certificado + conta de serviços).”

3. Acessando Meta Business Suite & Centro de Segurança

  • Abra um navegador e acesse business.facebook.com, depois faça login com sua conta do Facebook.

  • Selecione a empresa correta no menu suspenso no canto superior esquerdo (a mesma conectada ao seu WhatsApp/BSP).

  • Na barra lateral esquerda, clique em Configurações → Configurações da empresa (ou “Mais configurações da empresa”).

  • Em Configurações da empresa, vá para Centro de Segurança.

No Centro de Segurança, você verá Iniciar verificação ou uma mensagem indicando que não está elegível no momento.

Screenshot a incluir: “Meta Business Suite → Configurações da empresa → Centro de Segurança com o botão ‘Iniciar verificação’ destacado.”

4. Iniciando o processo de verificação

No Centro de Segurança, clique em Iniciar verificação.

Um assistente será aberto solicitando os seguintes dados da empresa:

  • Nome legal da empresa (deve corresponder exatamente aos documentos).

  • Endereço comercial (cidade, estado, CEP exatamente como nos documentos).

  • Número de telefone comercial (qualquer número comercial onde a Meta possa contatar).

  • URL do site onde o nome legal está claramente visível.

Revise cuidadosamente as informações e clique em Avançar / Continuar.

Screenshot a incluir: “Formulário de detalhes da empresa preenchido corretamente.”

5. Enviando seus documentos comerciais

Na etapa de documentos, a Meta solicitará arquivos que comprovem:

  • Seu nome legal (certificado de registro, GST/documento fiscal, incorporação).

  • Seu endereço comercial (mesmo documento ou um adicional).

  • Opcionalmente, o telefone comercial (conta telefônica, extrato bancário etc.).

Diretrizes:

  • Envie scans ou PDFs legíveis; evite imagens cortadas ou borradas.

  • O nome e endereço devem corresponder exatamente ao que foi preenchido.

  • Use documentos oficiais sempre que possível.

Screenshot a incluir: “Tela de upload com documentos anexados.”

Clique em Enviar / Avançar após anexar tudo.

6. Confirmando sua empresa por e-mail, telefone ou domínio

Após enviar os documentos, a Meta solicitará confirmação via:

Verificação por e-mail
A Meta envia um código para um e-mail profissional (ex.: nome@suempresa.com).

Verificação por telefone/SMS
A Meta liga ou envia um SMS com um código para seu telefone comercial.

Verificação de domínio
Você adiciona um registro DNS TXT ou envia um arquivo HTML ao seu domínio.

Insira o código ou conclua o processo de domínio e clique em Verificar.

Screenshot a incluir: “Tela mostrando opções de e-mail / telefone / domínio & campo de código.”

7. Verificando status e tempo de análise

Após concluir, a solicitação entra em revisão.

  • Geralmente, a decisão leva alguns minutos ou 1–2 dias úteis, podendo chegar a 10–14 dias úteis.

  • No Centro de Segurança, o status aparecerá como Em revisão, Empresa verificada ou Verificação falhou.

Screenshot a incluir: “Centro de Segurança com selo verde e status Empresa verificada.”

8. Razões comuns de rejeição (e como evitar)

A rejeição ocorre geralmente por:

  • Nome ou endereço não correspondendo aos documentos.

  • Arquivos ilegíveis ou incompletos.

  • O site não mostra claramente o nome legal.

  • Documento incorreto (ex.: documento pessoal ao invés de registro da empresa).

A Meta permite várias tentativas. Em caso de falha repetida, pode ser necessário abrir um recurso.

Screenshot a incluir: “Exemplo de mensagem de rejeição com opções para Re-verificar.”

9. Após a verificação: habilitando transmissões no WhatsApp

Quando sua empresa estiver verificada, sua plataforma/BSP poderá:

  • Desbloquear limites maiores de envio.

  • Adicionar mais números WhatsApp no Business Manager.

  • Concluir configurações da API do WhatsApp / Cloud API.

Recomendação: peça ao cliente para enviar um print mostrando "Empresa verificada" para prosseguir.

10. Bloco de referência rápida

  • Onde ir: business.facebook.com → Configurações da empresa → Centro de Segurança → Iniciar verificação.

  • O que precisa: Acesso admin, site, documentos oficiais.

  • Tempo de análise: minutos a 10–14 dias úteis.

  • Indicador de sucesso: Selo verde + Empresa verificada.

title: Facebook/Meta Business Verification Guide
description: This guide helps businesses get their Facebook/Meta Business verification to get started with the Facebook business services
body:
1. Why is business verification required

Meta uses Business Verification to confirm that your company is a real, legally registered business.
A verified business can unlock higher WhatsApp messaging limits, add more phone numbers, and is required by many WhatsApp Business Solution Providers (BSPs) to enable large-scale broadcasting.

2. Prerequisites checklist

Before you start, make sure you have the following:

  • Admin access to your Meta Business (Business Manager) account in Meta Business Suite.

  • A legal, registered business (company, LLP, sole proprietorship, etc.).

  • A website that shows your legal business name in the footer, About, or Contact section.

  • Access to a business email or phone number that matches your business information.

You will also need clear scans or PDFs of at least 2–3 official documents:

  • Business registration certificate/incorporation certificate / GST or tax certificate.

  • Utility bill, bank statement, or phone bill showing your business address or phone.

  • Screenshot to include in your document: “Sample acceptable business documents list” (e.g., certificate + utility bill).

3. Accessing Meta Business Suite & Security Centre

  1. Open a browser and go to business.facebook.com, then log in with your Facebook account.

  2. Select the correct Business from the dropdown in the top-left (the same one connected to your WhatsApp setup / BSP).

  3. In the left sidebar, click Settings → Business settings (or “More Business settings”, depending on your layout).

  4. In Business settings, go to Security Centre in the left or top navigation.

In Security Centre, you will either see Start verification or a note saying you are ineligible for verification at this time.

Screenshot to include: “Meta Business Suite → Business Settings → Security Centre with the ‘Start verification’ button highlighted.”

4. Starting the verification process

  1. In Security Centre, click Start verification.

  2. A wizard will open, asking for your business details such as:

  • Legal business name (must match your official documents).

  • Business address (city, state, postal code exactly as on documents).

  • Business phone number (can be any business number where Meta can reach you, not necessarily the WhatsApp number).

  • Website URL where your legal name is clearly visible.

3. Carefully review the information and click Next / Continue.

Screenshot to include: “Business details form showing legal name, address, phone, website fields filled correctly.”

5. Uploading your business documents

On the documents step, Meta will ask you to upload files that prove:

  • Your legal business name (registration certificate, GST/tax cert, incorporation document).

  • Your business address (same or another document showing address).

  • Optionally, your business phone number (phone/utility bill, bank statement, etc.).

Guidelines to follow:

  • Upload clear, readable scans or PDFs; avoid cropped or blurred images.

  • Ensure the name and address exactly match what you typed in the form.

  • Use official government or tax-related documents wherever possible.

Screenshot to include: “Upload documents screen with example files attached and document types visible (e.g., Certificate of Incorporation + Utility Bill).”

Click Submit / Next once all required files are uploaded.

6. Confirming your business via email, phone, or domain

After submitting documents, Meta asks you to confirm your connection to the business using one of these methods (options depend on your setup and region):

Email verification

  • Meta sends a code to a work email (for example, name@yourcompany.com).

  • The email domain must match your website domain.

Phone/text verification

  • Meta calls or sends an SMS with a code to your business phone number.

  • You may be asked to upload a document (e.g., utility bill) that shows this phone number.

Domain verification

  • You add a DNS TXT record or upload a special HTML file to your website domain following Meta’s instructions.

  • Once Meta detects it, your domain is verified and linked to your business.

Enter the code you receive or complete domain setup, then click Verify / Continue in Meta.

Screenshot to include: “Screen showing the choice of Email / Phone / Domain as verification methods and an example code entry field.”

7. Checking status and typical review time

After completion, your request goes into review with Meta.

  • For many accounts, decisions may arrive within a few minutes to 1–2 business days, but it can also take up to 10–14 business days in some cases.

  • You can check progress in Business settings → Security Center, where the status will show as In review, Business verified, or Verification failed.

When verification is approved, you will see a green shield and the label Business verified next to your business name.

Screenshot to include: “Security Centre with green shield and ‘Business Verified’ status visible.”

8. Common rejection reasons (and how to avoid them)

If Meta rejects your verification, it is usually due to one of the following:

  • The business name or address in the form does not exactly match your documents.

  • Uploaded files are unclear, cropped, or missing pages.

  • The business website does not show the legal business name clearly.

  • An unsupported or incorrect document type (e.g., personal ID instead of business registration).

Meta typically allows multiple attempts; if verification fails several times, you may need to appeal or contact Meta support via their help channels.

Screenshot to include: “Example of a rejection message in Security Centre with guidance to ‘Re-verify’ or appeal.”

9. After verification: enabling WhatsApp broadcasting

Once your Meta Business shows as Business verified, your WhatsApp BSP / platform (e.g., your broadcasting tool) can:

  • Unlock higher messaging limits so you can send campaigns to more contacts.

  • Add more WhatsApp numbers under the same Business Manager if needed.

  • Proceed with any remaining setup for WhatsApp Business API/Cloud API and broadcasting templates.

Recommendation for your documentation: add a final step like “Once you see ‘Business verified’, please share a screenshot with our support team so we can complete your WhatsApp broadcasting setup.”

10. Quick reference block

  • Where to go: business.facebook.com → Business settings → Security Centre → Start verification.

  • What you need: Admin access, correct business details, website, and 2–3 official documents.

  • Typical review time: From a few minutes up to 10–14 business days.

  • Success indicator: Green shield + Business verified status in Security Centre.


​
​

en.title: Edit Properties in HubSpot
en.body:
This feature allows admins to control which HubSpot properties a specific team can edit. With this, you can ensure data consistency and secure your organization's HubSpot data access.

✅ What This Feature Does

  • Lets admins assign “edit permissions” to properties based on teams

  • Supports multiple CRM modules: Contacts, Deals, and Tickets

  • Ensures only authorized teams can modify key data fields

  • Requires a final “Apply” step to activate settings

👥 Who Can Use This Feature

  • Admins only — team-level permissions cannot be managed by regular users

How to Set Edit Properties for Teams

Follow these steps to configure edit permissions:

Step 1: Select a Team

  • Navigate to Edit Properties Settings in HubSpo
    ​


    ​

  • Choose the team for which you want to define editable properties

This determines which users will be impacted by your settings.

Step 2: Select a Module

Choose the CRM module where you want to set permissions:

  • Contacts

  • Deals

  • Tickets

You must repeat this process for each module if needed.

Step 3: Select Edit Properties

  • A list of properties will appear

  • Check the properties you want the selected team to edit

  • Leave unchecked any property that should be read-only for that team

Example: Sales team can edit deal stage, but Support cannot.

Step 4: Save Settings

  • Click Save to record your configuration

Saving stores your preferences — but does not apply them yet.

Step 5: Apply the Changes

  • Go to Extensions

  • Open the Edit Properties extension settings

  • Click Apply

This final step activates the permissions for all users in the selected team.

⚠️ Important Notes

  • Settings won’t take effect until you click Apply

  • You can modify permissions anytime by repeating the steps

  • Users may need to refresh CRM pages to see updated access rules

❓ FAQ

Q: Can I assign different permissions for multiple teams?

Yes — repeat the setup for each team individually.

Q: Do users need to relogin after changes?

Not always, but refreshing their CRM is recommended.

Q: Who can make these changes?

Only admins with permission to configure extension settings.

en.title: Active Users API
en.body:
Overview:

The Last Active Users API allows you to fetch a list of users who have recently been active within your organization. This public API helps track user engagement, monitor team activity, and maintain operational visibility.

It requires an Organization Bearer Token for authentication, ensuring only authorized organizations can access user activity data.

Path URL:

https://api.eazybe.com/v2/users/public/last-active

API Usage:

Endpoint:
GET https://api.eazybe.com/v2/users/public/last-active

Headers:

Header

Description

Example

Authorization

Bearer token used for authentication. Must be a valid Organization Auth Token.

Bearer YOUR-BEARER-TOKEN

Example cURL Request:

curl --location 'https://api.eazybe.com/v2/users/public/last-active' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR-BEARER-TOKEN'

Sample Request Code (Node.js with Axios):

const axios = require('axios');
let config = {
  method: 'get',
  maxBodyLength: Infinity,
  url: 'https://api.eazybe.com/v2/users/public/last-active',
  headers: { 
    'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR-BEARER-TOKEN'  }
};

axios.request(config)
.then((response) => {
  console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data, null, 2));
})
.catch((error) => {
  console.error(error);
});

Example Response:

{"statusCode": 200,"status": "success","message": "Users fetched successfully","data": [{"id": 101001,"name": "John Doe","email": "john.doe@company.com","phone": "919812345678","last_active": "2025-10-10T04:28:16.000Z"},{"id": 101002,"name": "Jane Smith","email": "jane.smith@company.com","phone": "14155552671","last_active": "2025-10-10T07:32:16.000Z"},{"id": 101003,"name": "Robert Brown","email": "robert.brown@company.com","phone": "5511987654321","last_active": "2025-08-30T19:37:57.000Z"},{"id": 101004,"name": "Emily Davis","email": "emily.davis@company.com","phone": "442079460123","last_active": "2025-10-10T07:22:46.000Z"},{"id": 101005,"name": "Michael Johnson","email": "michael.johnson@company.com","phone": "16135551212","last_active": "2025-10-10T03:22:36.000Z"},{"id": 101006,"name": "Sarah Wilson","email": "sarah.wilson@company.com","phone": "8135556789","last_active": "2025-10-10T07:22:26.000Z"},{"id": 101007,"name": "David Thompson","email": "david.thompson@company.com","phone": "33123456789","last_active": "2025-10-10T07:22:25.000Z"}] }

Response Fields:

Field

Type

Description

id

number

Unique identifier of the user.

name

string

Full name of the user.

email

string

Registered email address of the user.

phone

string

User’s phone number (in international format).

last_active

string (ISO Date)

Timestamp of when the user was last active.

How to get Organization's Auth Token?

You can obtain your Organization's Auth Token from the EazyBe Workspace by following these steps:


1. The organization's admin must log in to the EazyBe Workspace using their credentials.

2. On the Organization page, the Organization's Auth Token will be displayed.

3. The admin can copy the Organization's Auth Token and paste it into the API request.

Response:

Status

Description

Success

Indicates the message has been successfully scheduled.

Failure

Possible errors include invalid email, missing fields, or permission issues.

Hygiene Practices:

  • Always use a valid Organization Auth Token.

  • Do not share or expose your token publicly.

  • Avoid frequent polling; use caching or periodic updates to reduce server load.

  • Keep your organization credentials secure at all times.

We hope this article has helped you better understand how EazyBe works! If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us at hey@eazybe.com. We're happy to help!

en.title: How to Send Template Broadcast Messages and Get Broadcast Analytics from Eazybe Extension
en.body:
Overview

Eazybe’s Broadcast feature lets you quickly send a WhatsApp message or template to a group of contacts directly from the extension. This is ideal for marketing announcements, alerts, or operational updates.

Instructions

Step 1: Open Broadcast in the Eazybe Extension

  • On WhatsApp Web with Eazybe extension, locate the top bar.

  • Click the Broadcast icon or menu.

  • Select Broadcast messages from the Menu.

Step 2: Enter Broadcast Details

  • Specify a unique broadcast name for your message (this helps track and manage previous broadcasts).

  • From the Template dropdown, choose the message template or quick reply you want to send.

  • From the Send to dropdown, select the group or label of contacts you wish to reach (e.g., “Leads”, “VIP Customers”, etc.).

  • Review all details to ensure accuracy.

Step 3: Send Your Broadcast

  • Click the Broadcast button at the bottom of the popup.

  • Your message will be queued with a progress bar and delivered via WhatsApp to all selected contacts under the chosen label.

Step 4: Check Your Broadcast Analytics

  • Click the Broadcast icon or menu.

  • Select Analytics from the Menu.

  • Check the Required Broadcast in matrix format which provide the total message sent, delivered, failed, read and the broadcast campagain status as Finished, In Progress or Failed.

Steps to consider

  • Make sure the broadcast name is descriptive and unique for tracking campaign analytics.

  • Templates should be pre-approved for WhatsApp to avoid delivery issues.

  • Use labels to segment your audience for targeted messaging.

For further assistance or troubleshooting, visit the Eazybe Help Center or reach out to Eazy Customer Success Team.

es.title: Cómo Enviar Mensajes de Difusión con Plantillas y Obtener Analíticas de Difusión en la Extensión de Eazybe
es.body:
Visión General

La función de Difusión de Eazybe te permite enviar rápidamente un mensaje de WhatsApp o una plantilla a un grupo de contactos directamente desde la extensión. Esto es ideal para anuncios de marketing, alertas o actualizaciones operativas.

Instrucciones

Paso 1: Abre Difusión en la Extensión de Eazybe

  • En WhatsApp Web con la extensión de Eazybe, localiza la barra superior.

  • Haz clic en el ícono o menú de Difusión.

  • Selecciona “Mensajes de Difusión” en el menú.

Paso 2: Ingresa los Detalles de la Difusión

  • Especifica un nombre único para tu difusión (esto ayuda a rastrear y gestionar difusiones anteriores).

  • En el desplegable “Plantilla”, elige la plantilla de mensaje o respuesta rápida que quieras enviar.

  • En el desplegable “Enviar a”, selecciona el grupo o etiqueta de contactos a los que quieras llegar (por ejemplo, “Leads”, “Clientes VIP”, etc.).

  • Revisa todos los detalles para garantizar precisión.

Paso 3: Envía Tu Difusión

  • Haz clic en el botón “Difundir” en la parte inferior del cuadro emergente.

  • Tu mensaje se pondrá en cola con una barra de progreso y se entregará vía WhatsApp a todos los contactos seleccionados bajo la etiqueta elegida.

Paso 4: Revisa Tus Analíticas de Difusión

  • Haz clic nuevamente en el ícono o menú de Difusión.

  • Selecciona “Analíticas” en el menú.

  • Busca la difusión requerida en formato de matriz, donde se mostrarán:

    • Total de mensajes enviados

    • Mensajes entregados

    • Mensajes fallidos

    • Mensajes leídos

    • Estado de la campaña de difusión: Finalizada, En Progreso o Fallida.

Puntos Importantes a Considerar

  • Asegúrate de que el nombre de la difusión sea descriptivo y único, para facilitar el rastreo de las analíticas de campaña.

  • Las plantillas deben estar pre-aprobadas por WhatsApp para evitar problemas de entrega.

  • Usa etiquetas para segmentar tu audiencia y enviar mensajes más dirigidos.

Para más asistencia o resolución de problemas, visita el Centro de Ayuda de Eazybe o contacta al equipo de Éxito del Cliente de Eazybe.

pt.title: Como Enviar Mensagens de Transmissão com Modelos e Obter Análises de Transmissão na Extensão Eazybe
pt.body:
Visão Geral

A funcionalidade de Transmissão do Eazybe permite enviar rapidamente uma mensagem do WhatsApp ou um modelo para um grupo de contatos diretamente pela extensão. Isso é ideal para anúncios de marketing, alertas ou atualizações operacionais.

Instruções

Passo 1: Abra Transmissão na Extensão Eazybe

  • No WhatsApp Web com a extensão Eazybe, localize a barra superior.

  • Clique no ícone ou menu de Transmissão.

  • Selecione “Mensagens de Transmissão” no menu.

Passo 2: Insira os Detalhes da Transmissão

  • Especifique um nome exclusivo para a sua transmissão (isso ajuda a rastrear e gerenciar transmissões anteriores).

  • No menu suspenso “Modelo”, escolha o modelo de mensagem ou resposta rápida que deseja enviar.

  • No menu suspenso “Enviar para”, selecione o grupo ou rótulo de contatos que deseja alcançar (por exemplo, “Leads”, “Clientes VIP” etc.).

  • Revise todos os detalhes para garantir precisão.

Passo 3: Envie Sua Transmissão

  • Clique no botão “Transmitir” na parte inferior do pop-up.

  • Sua mensagem será colocada em fila com uma barra de progresso e entregue via WhatsApp a todos os contatos selecionados sob o rótulo escolhido.

Passo 4: Verifique Suas Análises de Transmissão

  • Clique novamente no ícone ou menu de Transmissão.

  • Selecione “Análises” no menu.

  • Localize a transmissão desejada em formato de matriz, onde serão exibidos:

    • Total de mensagens enviadas

    • Mensagens entregues

    • Mensagens com falha

    • Mensagens lidas

    • Status da campanha de transmissão: Finalizada, Em Progresso ou Falha.

Pontos Importantes a Considerar

  • Certifique-se de que o nome da transmissão seja descritivo e único, para facilitar o rastreamento das análises da campanha.

  • Os modelos devem ser pré-aprovados pelo WhatsApp para evitar problemas de entrega.

  • Use rótulos para segmentar seu público e enviar mensagens mais direcionadas.

Para mais assistência ou resolução de problemas, acesse o Centro de Ajuda do Eazybe ou entre em contato com a equipe de Sucesso do Cliente da Eazybe.

title: How to Send Template Broadcast Messages and Get Broadcast Analytics from Eazybe Extension
body:
Overview

Eazybe’s Broadcast feature lets you quickly send a WhatsApp message or template to a group of contacts directly from the extension. This is ideal for marketing announcements, alerts, or operational updates.

Instructions

Step 1: Open Broadcast in the Eazybe Extension

  • On WhatsApp Web with Eazybe extension, locate the top bar.

  • Click the Broadcast icon or menu.

  • Select Broadcast messages from the Menu.

Step 2: Enter Broadcast Details

  • Specify a unique broadcast name for your message (this helps track and manage previous broadcasts).

  • From the Template dropdown, choose the message template or quick reply you want to send.

  • From the Send to dropdown, select the group or label of contacts you wish to reach (e.g., “Leads”, “VIP Customers”, etc.).

  • Review all details to ensure accuracy.

Step 3: Send Your Broadcast

  • Click the Broadcast button at the bottom of the popup.

  • Your message will be queued with a progress bar and delivered via WhatsApp to all selected contacts under the chosen label.

Step 4: Check Your Broadcast Analytics

  • Click the Broadcast icon or menu.

  • Select Analytics from the Menu.

  • Check the Required Broadcast in matrix format which provide the total message sent, delivered, failed, read and the broadcast campagain status as Finished, In Progress or Failed.

Steps to consider

  • Make sure the broadcast name is descriptive and unique for tracking campaign analytics.

  • Templates should be pre-approved for WhatsApp to avoid delivery issues.

  • Use labels to segment your audience for targeted messaging.

For further assistance or troubleshooting, visit the Eazybe Help Center or reach out to Eazy Customer Success Team.

en.title: Managing Unreplied Chats with Eazybe AI Agent
en.body:
Introduction

Eazybe’s AI-powered chat management system helps sales and support teams efficiently manage their WhatsApp conversations by prioritizing unreplied chats. This tool analyzes chat content, categorizes messages by urgency, and provides actionable notifications and filters so your team can focus on what matters most.

How Eazybe AI Chat Prioritization Works

  • Automatic Chat Categorization:

    The AI agent scans every unreplied chat and applies a priority label. Critical or Non-Critical based on specific indicators such as keywords (e.g., urgent, cancel, refund), customer value from your CRM, and the nature of the inquiry.

  • Real-Time Status Updates:

    Team members see visual labels beside chats in the Team Inbox or chat extension, highlighting high-priority conversations to act on immediately.

  • Scheduled Admin Notifications:

    Designated administrators receive WhatsApp message summaries every three hours listing unreplied chats, grouped by criticality to keep oversight tight.

Step-by-Step Usage Guide

Step 1: Open Your Team Inbox

  • Log in to the Eazybe workspace.

  • Navigate to the Team Inbox from the sidebar menu.

  • Click on Unreplied

  • View all chat conversations sorted by status, including those awaiting replies.

Step 2: Identify Critical Chats

  • Critical chats will have a clear red label or icon indicating high priority.

  • Regularly scan this list to quickly identify issues requiring urgent attention.

  • Example indicators for critical chats include complaints, billing questions, order cancellations, and high-value customer alerts.

Step 3: Filter Your Chat View

  • Use the built-in filter control to toggle between viewing:

    • All chats

    • Only critical chats

    • Only non-critical chats

  • This helps streamline task focus and workload management.

Administrator Features & Controls

  • Receive automated WhatsApp notifications at customizable intervals with chat summary stats.

  • Access detailed chat logs for performance review.

  • Configure notification timings to align with business hours.

  • Customize thresholds or keywords for chat prioritization (coming soon as advanced feature).

For help setting up or customizing your AI chat prioritization system, contact your Eazybe customer success or visit the Eazybe helpdesk portal.

es.title: Gestionando Chats No Respondidos con el Agente de IA de Eazybe
es.body:
Introducción

El sistema de gestión de conversaciones de Eazybe, impulsado por IA, ayuda a los equipos de ventas y soporte a gestionar de forma eficiente sus conversaciones de WhatsApp, priorizando los chats no respondidos. Esta herramienta analiza el contenido de los chats, clasifica los mensajes por urgencia y proporciona notificaciones y filtros accionables para que tu equipo se enfoque en lo más importante.

Cómo Funciona la Priorización de Chats con IA de Eazybe

  • Clasificación Automática de Chats: El agente de IA analiza cada chat no respondido y aplica una etiqueta de prioridad: Crítico o No Crítico, en función de indicadores específicos como:

    • Palabras clave (ej.: urgente, cancelar, reembolso)

    • Valor del cliente en tu CRM

    • Naturaleza de la consulta

  • Actualizaciones de Estado en Tiempo Real: Los miembros del equipo ven etiquetas visuales junto a los chats en la Bandeja de Entrada del Equipo o en la extensión de chat, resaltando las conversaciones de alta prioridad que requieren acción inmediata.

  • Notificaciones Programadas para Administradores: Los administradores designados reciben resúmenes por WhatsApp cada tres horas, listando los chats no respondidos agrupados por criticidad, garantizando un control más estricto.

Guía Paso a Paso de Uso

Paso 1: Abre tu Bandeja de Entrada del Equipo

  • Ingresa al espacio de trabajo de Eazybe.

  • En el menú lateral, navega hasta Bandeja de Entrada del Equipo.

  • Haz clic en No Respondidos.

  • Visualiza todas las conversaciones ordenadas por estado, incluidas las que esperan respuesta.

Paso 2: Identifica los Chats Críticos

  • Los chats críticos tendrán una etiqueta o ícono rojo indicando alta prioridad.

  • Revisa regularmente esta lista para identificar rápidamente los asuntos que requieren atención urgente.

  • Ejemplos de indicadores de chats críticos: quejas, dudas de facturación, cancelación de pedidos y alertas de clientes de alto valor.

Paso 3: Filtra tu Vista de Chats

  • Usa el control de filtros incorporado para alternar entre:

    • Todos los chats

    • Solo chats críticos

    • Solo chats no críticos

  • Esto ayuda a agilizar el enfoque del equipo y la gestión de la carga de trabajo.

Funciones y Controles para Administradores

  • Recibir notificaciones automáticas por WhatsApp en intervalos personalizables con resúmenes de chats.

  • Acceder a registros detallados de chats para revisión de rendimiento.

  • Configurar horarios de notificación según la jornada laboral de la empresa.

  • Personalizar umbrales o palabras clave para la priorización de chats (próximamente como función avanzada).

Para obtener ayuda en la configuración o personalización del sistema de priorización de chats por IA, contacta al equipo de Éxito del Cliente de Eazybe o visita el portal de ayuda de Eazybe.

pt.title: Gerenciando Conversas Não Respondidas com o Agente de IA da Eazybe
pt.body:
Introdução

O sistema de gestão de conversas da Eazybe, impulsionado por IA, ajuda as equipes de vendas e suporte a gerenciar de forma eficiente suas conversas no WhatsApp, priorizando os chats não respondidos. Essa ferramenta analisa o conteúdo das conversas, categoriza as mensagens por urgência e fornece notificações e filtros acionáveis para que sua equipe foque no que é mais importante.

Como Funciona a Priorização de Chats da Eazybe com IA

  • Categorização Automática de Chats: O agente de IA analisa cada conversa não respondida e aplica um rótulo de prioridade: Crítica ou Não Crítica, com base em indicadores específicos como:

    • Palavras-chave (ex.: urgente, cancelar, reembolso)

    • Valor do cliente no seu CRM

    • Natureza da solicitação

  • Atualizações de Status em Tempo Real: Os membros da equipe veem rótulos visuais ao lado das conversas na Caixa de Entrada da Equipe ou na extensão de chat, destacando conversas de alta prioridade que exigem ação imediata.

  • Notificações Agendadas para Administradores: Administradores designados recebem resumos via WhatsApp a cada três horas, listando conversas não respondidas agrupadas por criticidade, garantindo maior controle.

Guia Passo a Passo de Uso

Passo 1: Abra Sua Caixa de Entrada da Equipe

  • Acesse o espaço de trabalho da Eazybe.

  • No menu lateral, navegue até Caixa de Entrada da Equipe.

  • Clique em Não Respondidos.

  • Veja todas as conversas, organizadas por status, incluindo as que aguardam resposta.

Passo 2: Identifique Conversas Críticas

  • Conversas críticas terão um rótulo ou ícone vermelho indicando alta prioridade.

  • Verifique periodicamente essa lista para identificar rapidamente questões que requerem atenção urgente.

  • Exemplos de indicadores para conversas críticas: reclamações, dúvidas de cobrança, cancelamento de pedidos e alertas de clientes de alto valor.

Passo 3: Filtre Sua Visualização de Chats

  • Use o controle de filtro integrado para alternar entre:

    • Todas as conversas

    • Apenas conversas críticas

    • Apenas conversas não críticas

  • Isso ajuda a otimizar o foco da equipe e a gestão da carga de trabalho.

Recursos e Controles para Administradores

  • Receber notificações automáticas no WhatsApp em intervalos personalizáveis, com estatísticas resumidas de conversas.

  • Acessar registros detalhados de chats para revisão de desempenho.

  • Configurar horários de notificação alinhados ao expediente da empresa.

  • Personalizar limites ou palavras-chave para priorização de chats (em breve como recurso avançado).

Para ajuda na configuração ou personalização do sistema de priorização de conversas por IA, entre em contato com o time de sucesso do cliente da Eazybe ou acesse o portal de helpdesk da Eazybe.

en.title: How to Create Templates from Eazybe Extension
en.body:
Creating WhatsApp templates in Eazybe makes it easy to send approved messages or quick replies to your contacts. The extension offers a guided process to save and reuse your frequently sent messages as templates.

Instructions

Step 1: Access "Quick Reply" in the Chat Input Field

  • Open the Eazybe extension on your WhatsApp web interface.

  • In any chat window, locate the chat input section.

  • Click on the "Quick Reply" option below and within the input field to open quick reply actions.

Step 2: Switch On the "Create Template" Toggle

  • In the quick reply menu, turn ON the toggle beside "Create Template."

  • This enables template creation mode, allowing you to set up new reusable message templates.

Step 3: Fill Template Details

  • Enter required details for your template, including:

    1. Template Name

    2. Language

    3. Category

    4. Template Type

      1. If you want to attached any media select Media from Template Type drop-down and select the required media Image, Video or Document from Media Type drop-down

      2. If you don't want to attach media. Please add a Header in text format only.

    5. Add the message content as required.

    6. Add footer (Optional)

    7. You can add upto 2 Call-to-action button by linking to any url or phone number strictly in the following format https://www.example.com format

    8. Review the template for accuracy and completeness.

Step 4: Create Template

  • Click on the "Create" button to save your new template.

  • Your template will now be available in the quick reply list for instant use in future chats.

Use Case

  • Templates can include personalization placeholders (like customer names or invoice numbers).

  • Saved templates are accessible in any chat via the quick reply menu.

  • Use templates to speed up customer support, sales outreach, and broadcast messaging.

For comprehensive support during onboarding, contact Eazybe support or consult your eazybe sales specialist.

es.title: Cómo Crear Plantillas en la Extensión de Eazybe
es.body:
Crear plantillas de mensajes en Eazybe facilita el envío de mensajes aprobados o respuestas rápidas a tus contactos. La extensión ofrece un proceso guiado para guardar y reutilizar mensajes que envías con frecuencia como plantillas.

Instrucciones

Paso 1: Accede a “Respuesta Rápida” en el Campo de Entrada del Chat

  • Abre la extensión de Eazybe en la interfaz de WhatsApp Web.

  • En cualquier ventana de chat, localiza la sección de entrada de mensajes.

  • Haz clic en la opción “Respuesta Rápida” debajo y dentro del campo de entrada para abrir las acciones de respuesta rápida.

Paso 2: Activa la opción “Crear Plantilla”

  • En el menú de respuestas rápidas, activa el interruptor junto a “Crear Plantilla”.

  • Esto habilita el modo de creación de plantilla, permitiéndote configurar nuevos mensajes reutilizables.

Paso 3: Completa los Detalles de la Plantilla

  • Ingresa los detalles necesarios para tu plantilla, incluidos:

    • Nombre de la Plantilla

    • Idioma

    • Categoría

    • Tipo de Plantilla

  • Si deseas adjuntar un archivo multimedia, selecciona Multimedia en el menú desplegable “Tipo de Plantilla” y luego elige la opción deseada: Imagen, Video o Documento.

  • Si no deseas adjuntar multimedia, agrega un Encabezado únicamente en formato de texto.

  • Agrega el contenido del mensaje según sea necesario.

  • Agrega un pie de página (Opcional).

  • Puedes añadir hasta 2 botones de Llamada a la Acción con enlaces a cualquier URL o número de teléfono, estrictamente en el formato: https://www.example.com.

  • Revisa la plantilla para garantizar precisión y completitud.

Paso 4: Crear Plantilla

  • Haz clic en el botón “Crear” para guardar tu nueva plantilla.

  • Tu plantilla ahora estará disponible en la lista de respuestas rápidas para uso instantáneo en futuros chats.

Caso de Uso

  • Las plantillas pueden incluir variables de personalización (como el nombre del cliente o el número de factura).

  • Las plantillas guardadas estarán disponibles en cualquier chat mediante el menú de respuestas rápidas.

  • Usa plantillas para agilizar atención al cliente, prospección de ventas y envío masivo de mensajes.

Para soporte completo durante la incorporación, contacta con el soporte de Eazybe o tu asesor comercial.

pt.title: Como Criar Modelos na Extensão Eazybe
pt.body:
Criar modelos de mensagens no Eazybe facilita o envio de mensagens aprovadas ou respostas rápidas aos seus contatos. A extensão oferece um pro

Instruções

Passo 1: Acesse “Resposta Rápida” no Campo de Entrada do Chat

  • Abra a extensão Eazybe na interface do WhatsApp Web.

  • Em qualquer janela de chat, localize a seção de entrada da mensagem.

  • Clique na opção “Resposta Rápida” abaixo e dentro do campo de entrada para abrir as ações de resposta rápida.

Passo 2: Ative o Toggle “Criar Modelo”

  • No menu de respostas rápidas, ative o botão ao lado de “Criar Modelo”.

  • Isso habilita o modo de criação de modelo, permitindo configurar novas mensagens reutilizáveis.

Passo 3: Preencha os Detalhes do Modelo

  • Insira os detalhes necessários para o seu modelo, incluindo:

    • Nome do Modelo

    • Idioma

    • Categoria

    • Tipo de Modelo

  • Se quiser anexar mídia, selecione Mídia no menu suspenso "Tipo de Modelo" e depois escolha o tipo de mídia desejado: Imagem, Vídeo ou Documento.

  • Se não quiser anexar mídia, adicione um Cabeçalho em formato de texto apenas.

  • Adicione o conteúdo da mensagem conforme necessário.

  • Adicione um rodapé (Opcional).

  • Você pode incluir até 2 botões de Chamada para Ação com links para qualquer URL ou número de telefone, estritamente no formato: https://www.example.com.

  • Revise o modelo para garantir precisão e completude.

Passo 4: Criar Modelo

  • Clique no botão “Criar” para salvar seu novo modelo.

  • Seu modelo agora estará disponível na lista de respostas rápidas para uso instantâneo em futuros chats.

Caso de Uso

  • Os modelos podem incluir variáveis de personalização (como nome do cliente ou número da fatura).

  • Modelos salvos ficam acessíveis em qualquer chat através do menu de respostas rápidas.

  • Use modelos para agilizar suporte ao cliente, prospecção de vendas e envio de mensagens em massa.

Para suporte completo durante a configuração inicial, entre em contato com o suporte da Eazybe ou com seu representante comercial.

en.title: Connecting Existing WhatsApp Business App Users to EazyBe
en.body:
What is Coexistence?

WhatsApp Business App Coexistence allows your business to use the same WhatsApp number with both the WhatsApp Business App and the WhatsApp Cloud API simultaneously. This means you can keep the convenience of the mobile app for day-to-day conversations while unlocking advanced automation, broadcasts, and CRM integration through Eazybe’s platform.

This feature avoids losing your chat history, contacts, or conversations when transitioning to API-powered messaging, enabling a seamless experience for your team.

Benefits of WhatsApp Business App Coexistence

  • Use the same phone number across both the WhatsApp Business App.

  • Synchronize messages and contacts in real-time: Messages sent/received through the app appear in the API inbox and vice versa.

  • Combine human interaction with automation: Use the mobile app for 1-to-1 chats, and API for scalable messaging and workflows.

  • Preserve chat history and contacts without data loss.

  • Maintain access to your familiar WhatsApp Business App interface.

Prerequisites for Coexistence Setup

Before you start, ensure:

  • Your WhatsApp Business app is updated to version 2.24.17 or higher.

  • You have a verified Meta Business Account with business verification completed.

  • Your business phone number is eligible and not currently linked to another WhatsApp API provider.

  • You have access to Eazybe’s WhatsApp Cloud API integration with necessary permissions.

  • Your webhook endpoints are configured to process Cloud API events.

  • You understand embedded signup workflows and have session logging enabled.

Step-by-Step Onboarding Guide

Step 1: Log in and Grant Permissions

  • Click connect to access your Facebook Business Account.

  • Grant Eazybe the necessary permissions to manage your WhatsApp assets.

    • Note: This popup is managed by Facebook. Eazybe does not see or store your personal Facebook login details as mentioned in privacy policy.

Step 2: Select Your Business Assets

Follow the on-screen prompts within the popup to:

  • Fill your business information with correct information in the input fields.

Step 3: Verify Your Phone Number

  • Connect to an existing WhatsApp Business number (Coexistence)

  • Enter your existing mobile number with the required country code.

Step 4: Scan QR Code on WhatsApp Business App

  • A QR code is generated.

  • Option 1 : Open WhatsApp Business app on your phone, you'll recieve a message from Facebook Business with a template message to Connect to Business Platform and click in Scan QR code Button.

  • Option 2 : Complete the verification by entering the access code which you can see on the screen and entering to your mobile.

Step 5: Sync Chat History (Optional but Recommended)

  • Meta will prompt you to sync messages.

  • Keep the WhatsApp Business app open during this process to import up to 6 months of chat history.

  • This preserves continuity of conversations across platforms.

Step 6: Confirm or edit your WhatsApp Business account

  • Verify or update your WhatsApp Business account details like WhatsApp Business account name and time zone and click next.

Step 7: Review required access and permission to EazyBe

  • Review and confirm the access request for the selected What's App Business account by clicking Confirm.

Step 8: Connecting your account

  • Once clicked confirm, your What's App business account will be connecting.

  • Click Finish your account is connected.

  • Once authorized, your number status shows as connected via coexistence.

  • Messages sent or received on either platform will appear on both.

Troubleshooting steps to be consider:

  • Keep your WhatsApp Business app open to maintain sync and minimize message loss during the coexistence setup.

  • You can continue using the mobile app for manual conversations while Eazybe handles automated replies, chatbots, and bulk broadcasts.

  • If you change numbers or unlink, a cooldown period of 1–2 months may be required before re-enabling coexistence on the same number.

  • This feature is ideal for businesses scaling automation without abandoning personal touch in direct chats.

FAQs

Q1. Can I use coexistence with my existing WhatsApp Business number?

Yes. Provided you meet prerequisites and haven’t recently disconnected the number, you can enable coexistence to combine API and app usage.

Q2. Will I lose any chat history or contacts?

No. The setup syncs your chat history and contacts seamlessly between app and API.

Q3. What if I want to stop coexistence?

You can unlink your WhatsApp Business app from the API via Eazybe workspace.

Q4. Is coexistence free?

Yes, coexistence itself has no additional cost, but Meta message charges and your Eazybe subscription apply as usual.

For comprehensive support during onboarding, contact Eazybe support or consult your eazybe sales specialist.

es.title: Conectando Usuarios Existentes de la App de WhatsApp Business a EazyBe
es.body:
¿Qué es la Convivencia?

La Convivencia de la App de WhatsApp Business permite que tu empresa use el mismo número de WhatsApp tanto en la aplicación WhatsApp Business como en la API de WhatsApp Cloud simultáneamente. Esto significa que puedes mantener la comodidad de la aplicación móvil para conversaciones diarias mientras desbloqueas automatizaciones avanzadas, transmisiones e integraciones con CRM mediante la plataforma de Eazybe.

Esta función evita la pérdida de historial de chats, contactos o conversaciones al migrar a la mensajería con API, garantizando una experiencia fluida para tu equipo.

Beneficios de la Convivencia en WhatsApp Business

  • Usa el mismo número de teléfono tanto en la App como en la API.

  • Sincroniza mensajes y contactos en tiempo real: los mensajes enviados/recibidos desde la aplicación aparecen en la bandeja de API y viceversa.

  • Combina interacción humana con automatización: usa la aplicación para chats 1-a-1 y la API para mensajería a escala y flujos de trabajo.

  • Conserva historial de chats y contactos sin pérdida de datos.

  • Mantén acceso a la interfaz familiar de la App de WhatsApp Business.

Requisitos previos para la Configuración de Convivencia

Antes de comenzar, asegúrate de:

  • Tener actualizada la aplicación de WhatsApp Business a la versión 2.24.17 o superior.

  • Disponer de una Cuenta Comercial de Meta verificada y con verificación empresarial completada.

  • Asegurarte que tu número esté habilitado y no vinculado actualmente a otro proveedor de la API de WhatsApp.

  • Tener acceso a la integración de la API de WhatsApp Cloud con Eazybe, con los permisos necesarios.

  • Configurar tus endpoints de webhook para procesar eventos de Cloud API.

  • Conocer los flujos de registro embebidos y tener habilitado el registro de sesiones.

Guía de incorporación paso a paso

Paso 1: Inicia sesión y otorga permisos

  • Haz clic en conectar para acceder a tu Cuenta Comercial de Facebook.

  • Otorga a Eazybe los permisos necesarios para administrar tus activos de WhatsApp.

Paso 2: Selecciona tus activos comerciales

  • Sigue las instrucciones en pantalla y completa los datos de tu empresa correctamente.

Paso 3: Verifica tu número de teléfono

  • Conéctate con un número existente de WhatsApp Business (Convivencia).

  • Introduce tu número junto con el código de país.

Paso 4: Escanea el código QR en la App de WhatsApp Business

  • Se generará un código QR.

  • Opción 1: Abre la aplicación de WhatsApp Business en tu teléfono. Recibirás un mensaje de Facebook Business con una plantilla para conectar a Business Platform. Haz clic en “Escanear código QR”.

  • Opción 2: Completa la verificación introduciendo el código de acceso que aparece en la pantalla en tu móvil.

Paso 5: Sincroniza el historial de chats (opcional pero recomendado)

  • Meta te pedirá sincronizar los mensajes.

  • Mantén la aplicación de WhatsApp Business abierta durante este proceso para importar hasta 6 meses de historial.

Paso 6: Confirma o edita tu cuenta de WhatsApp Business

  • Verifica o actualiza detalles como el nombre de la cuenta y la zona horaria, y haz clic en “Siguiente”.

Paso 7: Revisa permisos para Eazybe

  • Confirma la solicitud de acceso de Eazybe a tu cuenta de WhatsApp Business.

Paso 8: Conecta tu cuenta

  • Tras hacer clic en confirmar, tu cuenta de WhatsApp Business quedará conectada.

  • Haz clic en “Finalizar” para completar la conexión.

  • Tu número se mostrará como conectado vía convivencia.

  • Los mensajes enviados o recibidos en cualquiera de las dos plataformas aparecerán en ambas.

Pasos de solución de problemas a tener en cuenta:

  • Puedes seguir usando la aplicación móvil para chats manuales, mientras Eazybe gestiona respuestas automáticas, chatbots y transmisiones en masa.

  • Si cambias de número o desvinculas tu cuenta, podría aplicarse un período de espera de 1 a 2 meses antes de reactivar la convivencia con el mismo número.

  • Esta función es ideal para empresas que desean escalar automatización sin perder el contacto humano en chats directos.

Preguntas Frecuentes

P1. ¿Puedo usar la convivencia con mi número actual de WhatsApp Business?

Sí. Siempre que cumplas los requisitos y el número no haya sido desconectado recientemente.

P2. ¿Perderé mi historial de chats o contactos?

No. El proceso sincroniza tu historial y contactos entre la App y la API.

P3. ¿Qué pasa si quiero dejar de usar la convivencia?

Puedes desvincular la App de WhatsApp Business de la API desde el workspace de Eazybe.

P4. ¿La convivencia es gratuita?

Sí, no tiene costo adicional. Sin embargo, se aplican las tarifas estándar de Meta por mensajes y tu suscripción de Eazybe.

Para soporte durante la incorporación, contacta con el soporte de Eazybe o tu asesor comercial.

pt.title: Conectando Usuários Existentes do WhatsApp Business App ao EazyBe
pt.body:
O que é Convivência?

A Convivência do WhatsApp Business App permite que sua empresa use o mesmo número do WhatsApp tanto no WhatsApp Business App quanto na API do WhatsApp Cloud simultaneamente. Isso significa que você pode manter a conveniência do aplicativo móvel para conversas do dia a dia enquanto desbloqueia automações avançadas, transmissões e integrações com CRM através da plataforma da Eazybe.

Esse recurso evita a perda do histórico de conversas, contatos ou mensagens ao migrar para a comunicação com a API, garantindo uma experiência perfeita para sua equipe.

Benefícios da Convivência no WhatsApp Business App

  • Use o mesmo número de telefone em ambos: o WhatsApp Business App e a API.

  • Sincronize mensagens e contatos em tempo real: mensagens enviadas/recebidas pelo aplicativo aparecem na caixa de entrada da API e vice-versa.

  • Combine interação humana com automação: use o aplicativo para conversas 1-a-1 e a API para mensagens em escala e fluxos de trabalho.

  • Preserve histórico de conversas e contatos sem perda de dados.

  • Mantenha acesso ao seu aplicativo WhatsApp Business familiar.

Pré-requisitos para Configuração da Convivência

Antes de começar, certifique-se de:

  • Ter o aplicativo WhatsApp Business atualizado para a versão 2.24.17 ou superior.

  • Possuir uma Conta Comercial Meta verificada e com verificação de negócios concluída.

  • Garantir que seu número comercial seja elegível e não esteja atualmente vinculado a outro provedor da API do WhatsApp.

  • Ter acesso à integração da API do WhatsApp Cloud através da Eazybe, com as permissões necessárias.

  • Configurar seus endpoints de webhook para processar eventos da Cloud API.

  • Conhecer os fluxos de cadastro incorporados e ter o log de sessões habilitado.

Guia de Onboarding Passo a Passo

Passo 1: Faça login e conceda permissões

  • Clique em conectar para acessar sua Conta Comercial do Facebook.

  • Conceda à Eazybe as permissões necessárias para gerenciar seus ativos do WhatsApp.

Passo 2: Selecione seus ativos comerciais

  • Siga as instruções na tela para preencher corretamente os dados de sua empresa.

Passo 3: Verifique seu número de telefone

  • Conecte-se a um número existente do WhatsApp Business (Convivência).

  • Digite seu número com o código do país.

Passo 4: Escaneie o QR Code no WhatsApp Business App

  • Um QR Code será gerado.

  • Opção 1: Abra o WhatsApp Business App no celular, você receberá uma mensagem do Facebook Business com um modelo de mensagem para conectar à Business Platform. Clique em “Escanear QR Code”.

  • Opção 2: Complete a verificação inserindo o código de acesso exibido na tela diretamente no seu aplicativo móvel.

Passo 5: Sincronize o histórico de conversas (opcional, porém recomendado)

  • O Meta solicitará a sincronização de mensagens.

  • Mantenha o WhatsApp Business App aberto durante esse processo para importar até 6 meses de histórico de conversas.

Passo 6: Confirme ou edite sua conta comercial do WhatsApp

  • Verifique ou atualize detalhes como o nome da conta e o fuso horário, clique em “Próximo”.

Passo 7: Revise permissões da Eazybe

  • Confirme o acesso solicitado pela Eazybe à sua conta comercial do WhatsApp.

Passo 8: Conectando sua conta

  • Após confirmar, sua conta do WhatsApp Business será conectada.

  • Clique em “Finalizar” para concluir a conexão.

  • Seu número aparecerá como conectado via convivência.

    Etapas de solução de problemas a serem consideradas:

  • Mensagens enviadas ou recebidas em qualquer uma das plataformas aparecerão nas duas.

  • Mantenha o aplicativo WhatsApp Business aberto para evitar perdas de mensagens durante a configuração.

  • Continue usando o aplicativo para conversas manuais, enquanto a Eazybe gerencia respostas automáticas, chatbots e transmissões em massa.

  • Se trocar de número ou desvincular, pode haver um período de espera de 1 a 2 meses antes de reativar a convivência no mesmo número.

  • Essa função é ideal para empresas que querem escalar automação sem abrir mão do contato humano nas conversas diretas.

Perguntas Frequentes

P1. Posso usar a convivência com meu número atual do WhatsApp Business?

Sim. Desde que cumpra os pré-requisitos e o número não esteja recentemente desconectado.

P2. Perderei meu histórico de conversas ou contatos?

Não. O processo sincroniza suas conversas e contatos entre o app e a API.

P3. E se eu quiser parar de usar a convivência?

Você pode desvincular o app do WhatsApp Business da API através da workspace da Eazybe.

P4. A convivência é gratuita?

Sim, não há custo extra pela convivência em si. Entretanto, aplicam-se as cobranças padrão do Meta por mensagens e sua assinatura da Eazybe.

Para suporte completo durante o onboarding, entre em contato com o suporte da Eazybe ou com seu consultor de vendas.

title: Connecting Existing WhatsApp Business App Users to EazyBe
body:
What is Coexistence?

WhatsApp Business App Coexistence allows your business to use the same WhatsApp number with both the WhatsApp Business App and the WhatsApp Cloud API simultaneously. This means you can keep the convenience of the mobile app for day-to-day conversations while unlocking advanced automation, broadcasts, and CRM integration through Eazybe’s platform.

This feature avoids losing your chat history, contacts, or conversations when transitioning to API-powered messaging, enabling a seamless experience for your team.

Benefits of WhatsApp Business App Coexistence

  • Use the same phone number across both the WhatsApp Business App.

  • Synchronize messages and contacts in real-time: Messages sent/received through the app appear in the API inbox and vice versa.

  • Combine human interaction with automation: Use the mobile app for 1-to-1 chats, and API for scalable messaging and workflows.

  • Preserve chat history and contacts without data loss.

  • Maintain access to your familiar WhatsApp Business App interface.

Prerequisites for Coexistence Setup

Before you start, ensure:

  • Your WhatsApp Business app is updated to version 2.24.17 or higher.

  • You have a verified Meta Business Account with business verification completed.

  • Your business phone number is eligible and not currently linked to another WhatsApp API provider.

  • You have access to Eazybe’s WhatsApp Cloud API integration with necessary permissions.

  • Your webhook endpoints are configured to process Cloud API events.

  • You understand embedded signup workflows and have session logging enabled.

Step-by-Step Onboarding Guide

Step 1: Log in and Grant Permissions

  • Click connect to access your Facebook Business Account.

  • Grant Eazybe the necessary permissions to manage your WhatsApp assets.

    • Note: This popup is managed by Facebook. Eazybe does not see or store your personal Facebook login details as mentioned in privacy policy.

Step 2: Select Your Business Assets

Follow the on-screen prompts within the popup to:

  • Fill your business information with correct information in the input fields.

Step 3: Verify Your Phone Number

  • Connect to an existing WhatsApp Business number (Coexistence)

  • Enter your existing mobile number with the required country code.

Step 4: Scan QR Code on WhatsApp Business App

  • A QR code is generated.

  • Option 1 : Open WhatsApp Business app on your phone, you'll recieve a message from Facebook Business with a template message to Connect to Business Platform and click in Scan QR code Button.

  • Option 2 : Complete the verification by entering the access code which you can see on the screen and entering to your mobile.

Step 5: Sync Chat History (Optional but Recommended)

  • Meta will prompt you to sync messages.

  • Keep the WhatsApp Business app open during this process to import up to 6 months of chat history.

  • This preserves continuity of conversations across platforms.

Step 6: Confirm or edit your WhatsApp Business account

  • Verify or update your WhatsApp Business account details like WhatsApp Business account name and time zone and click next.

Step 7: Review required access and permission to EazyBe

  • Review and confirm the access request for the selected What's App Business account by clicking Confirm.

Step 8: Connecting your account

  • Once clicked confirm, your What's App business account will be connecting.

  • Click Finish your account is connected.

  • Once authorized, your number status shows as connected via coexistence.

  • Messages sent or received on either platform will appear on both.

Troubleshooting steps to be consider:

  • Keep your WhatsApp Business app open to maintain sync and minimize message loss during the coexistence setup.

  • You can continue using the mobile app for manual conversations while Eazybe handles automated replies, chatbots, and bulk broadcasts.

  • If you change numbers or unlink, a cooldown period of 1–2 months may be required before re-enabling coexistence on the same number.

  • This feature is ideal for businesses scaling automation without abandoning personal touch in direct chats.

FAQs

Q1. Can I use coexistence with my existing WhatsApp Business number?

Yes. Provided you meet prerequisites and haven’t recently disconnected the number, you can enable coexistence to combine API and app usage.

Q2. Will I lose any chat history or contacts?

No. The setup syncs your chat history and contacts seamlessly between app and API.

Q3. What if I want to stop coexistence?

You can unlink your WhatsApp Business app from the API via Eazybe workspace.

Q4. Is coexistence free?

Yes, coexistence itself has no additional cost, but Meta message charges and your Eazybe subscription apply as usual.

For comprehensive support during onboarding, contact Eazybe support or consult your eazybe sales specialist.

en.title: How to Top Up or Add Credits in Eazybe
en.body:
Summary

This article explains Eazybe credits, which are used for sending WhatsApp messages via the platform including broadcasts and automation. It describes the process for checking your balance, topping up, and maintaining a minimum credit balance to ensure uninterrupted messaging service.

What Are Eazybe Credits?

Eazybe credits are the virtual balance that pays for sending messages through WhatsApp API integration. Each message or broadcast uses credits depending on your usage and integration with Meta pricing.

Types of Messages

Messages sent from Eazybe can include:

  • Broadcasts: Mass messaging to contacts for marketing, updates, or promotions.

  • Automated WhatsApp Messages: Transactional notifications and customer updates triggered by your CRM or business processes.

  • Templates: Pre-approved WhatsApp messages used for utility, marketing, or authentication.

Meta applies different charges per message based on message type and recipient country.

Ensuring Sufficient Credits

To keep sending messages smoothly, you must maintain a minimum balance in your Eazybe account (recommended $10 or more in credits). If your credits run out, broadcasts and automations will be paused until you top up.

How Do I Top Up or Add More Credits?

To add credits to your Eazybe account, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to Eazybe: Access your Eazybe dashboard.

  2. Navigate to Billing: On the sidebar, click "Billing" under your settings.

  3. Enter Top-Up Amount: In the Credits section, type the amount you wish to add.

  4. Complete Purchase: Click "Purchase Credits" to finalize. Your new credit balance will appear instantly after payment.

What Are the Messaging Charges?

Charges vary based on the message type and recipient’s country code (as set by Meta/WhatsApp). You can view the exact message charges and usage history in your Eazybe dashboard under Billing.

Frequently Asked Questions

Eazybe Credits Overview

1. What are Eazybe credits used for?

Eazybe credits are used for sending WhatsApp messages, broadcasts, and automations through your connected WhatsApp Business API account.

2. What types of messages can I send with Eazybe credits?

With Eazybe credits, you can send:

  • Broadcasts

  • Automated CRM messages

  • Approved WhatsApp templates for marketing, utility, or authentication purposes.

Pricing & Charges

3. How are charges for messages determined?

Charges are set by Meta/WhatsApp, depending on message type (broadcast, template, automation) and recipient country code.

4. Where can I see my messaging charges?

You can check your message charges and credit usage history in the Billing section of the Eazybe dashboard.

Managing Eazybe Credits

5. What happens if I run out of credits?

If your account balance drops to zero, broadcasts and automated messages will be paused until you add credits.

6. What is the minimum credit balance required?

It's recommended to maintain at least $10 in credits to avoid service interruptions.

7. How can I top up my Eazybe credits?

  • Log in to your Eazybe dashboard

  • Go to "Billing"

  • Enter the desired amount for top-up

  • Click "Purchase Credits"

  • Check for payment confirmation and updated balance.

For further assistance, contact Eazybe support or visit the Help section.
